text: R.J. Kost is an American politician who currently serves in the Wyoming Senate from the 19th district as a member of the Republican Party. ==Career== In 2018, Kost defeated incumbent Senator R. Ray Peterson with 53.80% of the vote. He serves on the Agriculture, State and Public Lands & Water Resources, Judiciary, School Facilities, and Interstate Compact for Adult Offender Supervision committees. ==Electoral history== === 2018 === ==References== Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Living people Category:People from Greybull, Wyoming Category:Rocky Mountain College alumni Category:University of Wyoming alumni Category:Wyoming Republicans Category:Wyoming state senators Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: R. J. Kost
